text:
@WhiteHouse @POTUS 
"It is hard to come to any conclusion other than that this is simply mafia government, exerting control for the sake of control, ...squeezing the American people, as they die in hospital beds and attend to the sick and scared." https://t.co/8itp66CGKb #TrumpCrimeFamily
